item.description:
Liberty marches on in Connecticut, come out and be a part of it. We are stepping things up for the push to April 24th with sign waves, literature distributions, canvassing, phone banking, super brochures inserted into local papers and other events.

We will be meeting at the Olympia Diner on the Berlin turnpike, they have a meeting room in the back which is reserved for us. We will continue the conversation regarding our strategy for Ron Paul and Liberty in the Constitution state. For the time being these will be on every 1st and 3rd Monday of the month. Looking forward to continuing the discussion!
item.name: CT4Liberty / Ron Paul 2012 Social & Organizational Meetup
